cgcloud__System_Number__c.name: cgcloud__System_Number__c
cgcloud__System_Number__c.description: This object specifies the number definition that's used for number generation on CAS OnPremise Mobility.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: When the number definition is selected as empty, the validation of number definition and segments applies.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the system number belongs.

cgcloud__System_Fallback_Number__c.description: Reference to the fallback number definition.

cgcloud__Usage_Validate__c.description: Only used for validation of the Usage field (unique).

cgcloud__Usage__c.description: Specifies the item for which the number definition is to be used.

cgcloud__Warning_Limit__c.description: Specifies a minimum limit of the number range that shows a warning message.
